module.sqlWrap: update UserPassport set PassportStatus=999 where PassportId = @Id
select PassportId from UserPassport where Email = @Email;
select PassportId from UserPassport where Mobile = @Mobile;
select PassportId from UserPassport where UserName = @UserName;
select * from UserPassport where PassportId = @Id; select * from UserSecurity where PassportId = @Id;

select * from UserPassport where (PassportStatus not in(999)) and (RoleId = @RoleId) and (if(isnull(@Keyword),1=1,((Mobile like @Keyword) or (UserName like @Keyword) or (RealName like @Keyword) or (UserCode like @Keyword) or (Email like @Keyword)))) order by PassportId asc

select * from UserPassport where RoleType=1 and (PassportStatus not in(999)) and (PassportId not in(@ExceptIds)) and (RoleId = @RoleId) and (if(isnull(@Keyword),1=1,((Mobile like @Keyword) or (UserName like @Keyword) or (Email like @Keyword)))) order by PassportId asc
